financial_services.rationale: Financed emissions (Scope 3) = 95%+ of footprint; operational neutrality without Scope 3 pathway is material omission
financial_services.materiality_source: PCAF Global GHG Accounting Standard for Financial Industry

oil_gas.rationale: Scope 1 dominates; intensity metrics can hide absolute growth from production increases
oil_gas.materiality_source: Climate Action 100+ Net Zero Company Benchmark

manufacturing.rationale: Supply chain emissions (Scope 3) ~50% of footprint; production volatility enables baseline manipulation

retail.rationale: Value chain emissions (Scope 3) = 70%+ of footprint; high reliance on offset purchases vs. operational reduction
retail.materiality_source: SASB Materiality Map: Multiline & Specialty Retailers

technology.rationale: Data center electricity + supply chain embodied emissions material; often aggressive targets reduce penalty
technology.materiality_source: SASB Materiality Map: Software & IT Services

healthcare.rationale: Moderate supply chain impact; medical device/pharma manufacturing has distributed emissions
healthcare.materiality_source: SASB Materiality Map: Health Care Delivery

utilities.rationale: Scope 1 dominates (power generation); intensity metrics critical; weak targets common due to asset lock-in
utilities.materiality_source: SASB Materiality Map: Electric Utilities & Power Generators
